description: On making a proj atk, the power is also used in the same direction. The power also has +1 to its debuff DCs and has its resource cost increased by 1 step.

name: Focused Eruption
description: The power's cone areas deal substantially more dmg but are smaller.

name: Heavy Power
description: The power's cone areas deal massively more dmg, but its usage time is increased by 1 step.

name: Shoving Eruption
description: Whenever the power's cone areas hit, the target is pushed 10' away from the cone's origin.

name: Desperate Eruption
target: powers with cone areas and a non-cooldown resource cost
description: The power can be used with no cost if you cannot afford its cost, but when you do so it can only target a single creature within its original area.

name: Volleying
target: powers that fire a single projectile
description: The power's proj is converted into a 15'-wide line with a length equal to the proj's range.

name: Accurate Fanning
target: powers that fire a single projectile and deal damage
description: The power's proj is converted into a cone with length equal to the original proj's range and has +1 Accuracy, but deals less dmg.

name: Infused Volleying
target: powers that fire a single projectile
description: While in a pers area, the power's proj is converted into a 25'-wide line with a length equal to the original proj's range.

name: Prismatic Recovery
target: powers with multiple damage type options and a non-cooldown resource cost
description: Whenever the power hits with its first dmg type option, you heal a slight amount of HP. With its second option, you gain temp HP. With its third option, you recover 1 unit of its resource cost but deal less dmg.

name: Dedication
target: powers with a non-cooldown resource cost and an Accuracy component
description: If the last 3 powers you used were the power, the power ignores dmg res and immunity, deals barely more dmg, heals you for barely any HP, grants you a slight amount of temp HP, and recovers 1 unit of its resource cost. Additionally, the power has -2 Accuracy.

name: Infusion
description: Whenever the power's projs pass through a pers area, they come out dealing substantially more dmg and with +1 Accuracy. Additionally, the power's usage time is increased by 1 step.

name: Supported Force
description: The power deals additional $physType dmg while you are adj to another player character.

name: Runecrafting
target: powers with a non-cooldown resource cost that fire projectiles
description: If you don't have an active runestone, instead of firing projs, the power lays a tiny runestone on an unoccupied space you can see within the original proj's range. If you already have an active runestone, the power's projs are fired from the runestone instead of you (using the stone's LoS) and deal massively more dmg with +2 Accuracy. At the end of combat, the runestone expires and you lose 1 unit of the power's resource cost.

name: Infused Projection
target: powers that summon entities that can deal your damage remotely
description: 1/rnd, when you use the power while buffed, all buffs on you are consumed to give the summoned entity substantially more dmg and increase its reach by 5' while it is dealing your dmg.

name: Channeled Projection
description: On turn start while concentrating on the power, your nearest summoned entity that can deal your damage remotely gains increased dmg for its next activation.

name: Detonating Missiles
description: Whenever the power's projs hit either a creature, obj, or structure, they explode, making a spell atk against all foes adj to the collision point (other than a hit creature) that deals 1d4 dmg of the proj's base type.

name: Infused Explosions
description: The power's sphere areas have more area if you have barrier specifically for their base dmg types.

name: Warding Recovery
target: powers with a non-cooldown resource cost that deal damage
description: Whenever the power hits, you recover 1 unit of its cost and gain temp HP whenever you use a limited power until the end of your next turn. Additionally, the power deals substantially less dmg.

name: Supported Precision
description: While buffed by the power, your other powers have +1 crit range.

name: Supported Adaptation
description: While buffed by the power, you treat all increased dmg taken on creatures as always matching your dmg.

name: Supported Prismatism
description: While offensively buffed, the power's hits inflict a DoT dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until DEX save. While buffed by an aura, the power's hits give slightly increased $nonPhysType dmg taken until the end of your next turn. While defensively buffed, the power's hits inflict a DoT dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until CON save. Additionally, the power deals substantially less dmg.

name: Incubating Chaos
description: Whenever the power hits, the next limited power you use triggers a Wild Magic Surge.

name: True Power
description: The power's base dmg is converted to true. Additionally, it deals more dmg.

name: Consistency
description: The power always deals the same base dmg type as the base dmg type of the last power you used. Additionally, it deals more dmg.

name: Swiftness
description: The power's usage time is reduced by 1 step and whenever you use it, you gain +10' sp for 1 round. Additionally, its dmg is substantially reduced.

name: True Divinity
description: The power's base dmg is converted to true. Additionally, whenever your party uses (and accepts the results of) a shrine, the power gains +1 dmg.

name: Monochromaticism
target: powers with multiple damage type options
description: Upon upgrading the power, choose one of its dmg type options - it always uses that dmg type, but its dmg is increased.

name: Desperate Command
description: While the power is buffing a minion, it gains +1 buff effectiveness while the minion is bloodied.

name: Draining Explosions
description: Minions buffed by the power lose barely any passive regen and if they die while buffed, the buff explodes and you make a spell atk against all foes adj to the corpse that deals massive $nonPhysType dmg.

name: Massive Command
description: The power has more area that only affects minions.

name: Ethereal Persistence
target: powers that create persistent areas that deal damage
description: The power's pers areas no longer deal dmg to minions, have their durations increased by 1 step, and are substantially smaller. Additionally, any increases to the pers areas' dmg are converted into increased dmg taken by minions inside.

name: Quickening Command
description: Minions buffed by the power have their power usage times decreased by 1 step, but they deal less dmg.

name: Powerful Command
description: The power has more area that only affects minions and grants minions buffed by it more dmg, but the minions lose barely any passive regen.

name: Borrowed Blessings
description: Whenever the power's buffs end, foes and minions adj to the buffed creature are cursed with increased global dmg taken until CHA save.

name: Sacrificial Command
description: Whenever a minion buffed by the power dies, another minion within 60' of it of your choice also dies, exploding. You make a spell atk against all foes adj to this corpse dealing massive B dmg.

name: Shared Command
description: While the power is buffing a minion and not you, you also receive all effects of the buff. Additionally, the buff has -1 effectiveness.

name: Commanding Beacons
description: While the power is buffing a foe, it does not grant that foe any of its effects, but instead radiates an aura that grants its effects to all minions within 60' of that foe. Additionally, the buff's duration is reduced by 1 step and it has +1 effectiveness.

name: Decaying Command
description: Minions buffed by the power inflict a DoT on hit dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until CHA save.

name: Afflicted Persistence
description: At the start of each of your turns, the power's pers areas inflict a DoT dealing $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until CHA save, to all foes and minions within their areas.

name: Blinding Command
description: Minions buffed by the power have their power usage times decreased by 1 step and are blinded.

name: Commanding Persistence
description: The power's pers areas deal slightly less dmg to minions, and any minions inside them deal slight additional $nonPhysType dmg with hits.

name: Focused Command
target: powers that apply buffs in an area
description: The power can now only buff a single minion within its area, but while the minion is buffed by the power, it deals massively more dmg.

name: Keen Command
target: powers with no cooldown that apply buffs
description: Minions buffed by the power always crit, but the power now can only be used once per combat.

name: Totemic Command
description: Minions buffed by the power have their sp reduced to 0 and continuously taunt all foes within 60' of them. Additionally, they have +2 AC.

name: Ethereal Decay
description: The power's pers areas no longer deal dmg to minions, but instead inflict a DoT dealing $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until CON save, on them on each tick.

name: Undying Command
description: Undead minions buffed by the power deal more dmg.

name: Inverted Command
target: powers that apply buffs in an area
description: The power's area is larger, but its buffs no longer apply to minions inside its area. Instead, relevant minions outside its area are affected.

name: Stable Empowerment
target: powers that apply buffs and require concentration
description: You can concentrate on the power twice, but it has -1 buff effectiveness.

name: Hastening Command
description: Whenever you buff a minion with the power, they have their power usage times reduced by 1 step for 1 round. Additionally, the power has -1 buff effectiveness.

name: Decaying Haste
description: Minions buffed by the power have +20' sp, but are inflicted with a DoT dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until DEX save, at the start of each of your turns

name: Necromantic Command
description: Whenever a minion buffed by the power dies, you summon a CR 1/4 energy zombie minion from its corpse that deals $nonPhysType dmg. Additionally, the power has -1 buff effectiveness.

name: Synergistic Empowerment
description: Whenever you use the power, the duration of another of your buffs of your choice is refreshed. Additionally, the power has -1 buff effectiveness.

name: Draining Armour
description: Minions buffed by the power have massively more phys barrier and deal more dmg, but have barely reduced passive regen.

name: Lingering Decay
description: Whenever the power's buffs expire, a foe of your choice adj to the buff's target is inflicted with a DoT dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until CHA save.

name: Empowering Summons
description: The power's minions' buffs have +1 effectiveness.

name: Berserking
description: Whenever you use the power, you gain the following effects for 1rnd: increased dmg, the usage times of your melee atks are reduced by 1 step, and you take substantially increased dmg.

name: Summoned Power
description: Whenever you use the power, your minions add additional $physType dmg to their melee hits for 1rnd.

name: Manifestation
description: Whenever you use the power, your crystal has a chance to flare.

name: Manifested Empowerment
description: While you have an active minion from the power, whenever your crystal flares, you and allies within 60' of you gain +1 crit range for 1rnd.

name: Duplicated Manifestation
description: While you have an active minion from the power, your crystals flare an additional time whenever they flare.

name: Massive Manifestation
description: While you have an active minion from the power, the areas of your crystal flares are substantially larger.

name: Empowered Decaying [next - Revitalising Totem]
description: Creatures buffed by the power's minions inflict a DoT on hit, dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until CON save.
